resources.string: In order to login, use your email in the pk.edu.pl domain. It should be registered by the session administrator. In case of any problems, contact your administrator.
In order to login, use your email in the student.pk.edu.pl domain. It should be registered by the session administrator. In case of any problems, contact your examiner.
Waiting for the student to join the session…
Waiting for the examiner to join the session…
Can\'t reach server. Check your internet connection.
Waiting for the examiner to start the session…
Welcome student! In order to continue, please draw your questions:
Do you want to accept the drawn questions and continue to the answering stage?
Do you want to deny student\'s request for redraw and continue to the answering stage?
Waiting for permission from the examiner…
After answering the questions, confirm your willingness to continue to the examiner.
Now you can once again look at the drawn questions and prepare to answer them. Report your readiness to answer by clicking the \"Confirm readiness\" button.
Examination board is summarizing the exam…
Not all grades have been set - cannot continue.
Do you want to end the questions answering and continue? Make sure that desired grades are selected.
Besides the diploma exam grade, the studies evaluation also consists of the grade for the presentation of the thesis, thesis grade and the grade of the course of studies. Please enter them.
Grade for the presentation of the thesis:
Mean grade for the course of studies:
Do you want to finish completing the additional grades and go to the summary? Make sure that desired grades are selected.
Thank you for participating in the Diploma Exam!
The final result was determined on the basis of the grade for the diploma exam, the thesis grade and the grade for the course of studies.
This e-mail belongs to the examiner!
This e-mail belongs to the student!
Select the student with whom you want to conduct the examination session.
Do you want to start the session with the student %1$s
No permission to do that action.
Do you want to draw the questions again? This will require the permission from the examiner.
